Uses of Class
org.jdom2.Comment

Packages that use Comment
org.jdom2 Classes to represent the components of an XML document. 
org.jdom2.filter Classes to programmatically filter nodes of a document based on type, name, value, or other aspects and to boolean and/or/negate these rules. 
org.jdom2.output Classes to output JDOM documents to various destinations.
